mainText:
It is so true, World has lost an amazing individual. But I am sure his 
presence will remain with all of us and he will be remembered as a great 
mentor and an amazing friend for those of you who have had the privilege 
of knowing and working with him and also as a great visionary and a tech 
geek for all of us that have been given the gift of various apple 
products. I guess he had to see the best iPhone launch yesterday before 
his soul left his body.
author: Vivek
